recipe.title: Chocolate Cake
recipe.instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Add wet ingredients and mix until smooth. Pour into a greased pan and bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipe.title: Caesar Salad
recipe.instructions: Chop the lettuce into bite-sized pieces. Toss with Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and black pepper. Serve chilled.

recipe.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe.instructions: Cook spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. Fry pancetta in olive oil until crisp. Beat eggs with Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper. Toss hot spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat. Quickly stir in the egg mixture and serve immediately.

recipe.title: Pancakes
recipe.instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl. Whisk milk, egg, and melted butter in a separate bowl. Combine wet and dry ingredients and stir until just mixed. Pour batter onto a hot greased skillet and cook until bubbles form on top. Flip and cook the other side until golden.

recipe.title: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
recipe.instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Grill until cooked through. Spread mayonnaise and mustard on bread slices. Assemble sandwiches with lettuce, tomato, and grilled chicken.
